channel.title: Very bad glitch involving sound favorites
channel.description:
(@Auxy) Every time I quit the Auxy app, it’s been erasing my favorited melodic sounds. I thought it was because of the beta I was testing a few months ago but I verified that I’m on the App Store version. I’m on an iPhone SE with iOS 12.3.
Is anyone else experiencing these issues?

item.title: Very bad glitch involving sound favorites
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
My guess is that this is related to iCloud since the favorites are stored there. We might be able to move it to the local storage and resolve this.

Read full topic
item.source: Very bad glitch involving sound favorites
